mqbfunction.name: switch 4:3 (Pillarbox) (PanScan)
switch 16:9
PIP
Swap PIP
Move PIP
Toggle PiPzap-mode
Clear EPG
mqbfunction.screen: Console, "Clear EPG", ["wget -q -O - http://127.0.0.1/web/powerstate?newstate=3; sleep 5; rm -f /media/hdd/epg.dat; rm -f /media/hdd/epg.dat.bak; exit 0"]

mqbfunction.name: Clear EPG and CrossEPG
mqbfunction.screen: Console, "Clear EPG and CrossEPG", ["wget -q -O - http://127.0.0.1/web/powerstate?newstate=3; sleep 5; rm -f /media/hdd/epg.dat; rm -f /media/hdd/epg.dat.bak; rm -f /media/hdd/crossepg/*; exit 0"]

mqbfunction.name: Restore EPG
mqbfunction.screen: Console, "Restore EPG", ["wget -q -O - http://127.0.0.1/web/powerstate?newstate=3; sleep 5; cp -rfp /media/hdd/backup/epg.dat /media/hdd; rm -f /media/hdd/epg.dat.bak; exit 0"]
